mapper.insert:
insert into zy-community.zy_files(files_url, create_time, update_by, update_time, create_by, del_flag, source, remark, parent_id, user_id) values
(#{entity.filesUrl}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.delFlag}, #{entity.source}, #{entity.remark}, #{entity.parentId}, #{entity.userId})

insert into zy-community.zy_files(files_url, create_time, update_by, update_time, create_by, del_flag, source, remark, parent_id, user_id) values
(#{entity.filesUrl}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.delFlag}, #{entity.source}, #{entity.remark}, #{entity.parentId}, #{entity.userId})
on duplicate key update files_url = values(files_url) , create_time = values(create_time) , update_by = values(update_by) , update_time = values(update_time) , create_by = values(create_by) , del_flag = values(del_flag) , source = values(source) , remark = values(remark) , parent_id = values(parent_id) , user_id = values(user_id)
